data.name: GrumpyTunez
data.detailed_description:
GrumpyTunez was designed for anyone to quickly tune a vehicle. This process can assist tuning a vehicle fast without prior knowledge of gear tuning. Grumpytunez runs as an overlay with supported games to analyze the telemetry data. Telemetry data out features are disabled by default. Features can be enabled via Settings/Hud and Gameplay menu of the game. Grumpytunez will analyze live output of telemetry data. Tune fast, Go fast!

Features:
  • Gear tuning
  • Dyno chart
  • Live RPM, HP, & TQ displays
  • Suspension tuning
  • Live Suspension display
  • Customizable tuning and display panel layouts.

Grumpytunez currently supports the following games:
  • Forza Horizon 4
  • Forza Horizon 5

Future supported titles:
  • Project Cars
  • Assetto Corsa

data.short_description: GrumpyTunez was designed for quick tuning of vehicles so anyone could tune, race & go faster!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-4170 @ 3.7Ghz OR Intel i5 750 @ 2.67Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 650TI OR AMD R7 250x
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • Additional Notes: Check supported game list. System Requirements are due to supported games requirements.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 15063.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7-3820 @ 3.6Ghz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 OR NVidia GTX 1060 3GB OR AMD R9 290x OR AMD RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • Additional Notes: Check supported game list. System Requirements are due to supported games requirements.
